entries.title: Shared Package Kurulumu
changes: Shared package.json guncellendi: name: @task-filewas/shared, main: dist/index.js, types: dist/index.d.ts
Dependencies eklendi: zod@3.24.2
DevDependencies eklendi: typescript@5.7.3
Shared tsconfig.json olusturuldu (strict mode, ES2022 target, declaration generation)
Shared src/index.ts olusturuldu (re-export pattern, zod export)
Shared src/types/index.ts olusturuldu (BaseEntity, ApiResponse, PaginatedResponse, status types, message types)
Shared src/schemas/index.ts olusturuldu (Zod schemas for validation - session, phase, agent, permission, thinking, model, message)

npm install basariyla tamamlandi
npm run build:shared basariyla test edildi - dist klasoru olusturuldu

entries.title: TypeScript Base Config
changes: Root tsconfig.json olusturuldu (base config - strict: true, target: ES2022, moduleResolution: bundler)
Strict type checking ayarlari eklendi (noImplicitAny, strictNullChecks, noUnusedLocals, noUncheckedIndexedAccess, vb.)
ESNext module ve bundler moduleResolution ayarlandi
isolatedModules ve verbatimModuleSyntax ozellikleri aktif edildi
Shared tsconfig.json guncellendi (extends root, composite: true, declaration: true)
shared/src/index.ts zaten mevcut - zod re-export ve modul yapisi tanimli
npm run build basariyla test edildi - TypeScript derleme calisiyor

changes: Backend tsconfig.json olusturuldu (module: NodeNext, moduleResolution: NodeNext)

Frontend tsconfig.json olusturuldu (jsx: react-jsx, lib: DOM, DOM.Iterable)
Frontend path alias'lar eklendi: @/* -> ./src/*, @shared/* -> ../shared/src/*
Frontend vite/client types dahil edildi
Frontend project references eklendi (shared'a referans)
Frontend tsconfig.node.json olusturuldu (Vite config icin ayri tsconfig)
Shared tsconfig.json guncellendi (module: ESNext, bundler moduleResolution)
Tum workspace'lerde npx tsc --noEmit basariyla test edildi
npm run typecheck root komutlari basariyla calisti

entries.title: Shared Types - Project & Session
changes: shared/src/types/project.ts olusturuldu - Project, ProjectCreate, ProjectUpdate, ProjectSummary interfaces
ProjectStatus (active/archived/deleted), ProjectType (web/backend/fullstack/mobile/cli/library/monorepo/other) tanimlandi
ProjectVersion, GitHubInfo, ProjectSettings, TechStack interfaces tanimlandi
shared/src/types/session.ts olusturuldu - Session, SessionCreate, SessionUpdate, SessionSummary interfaces
SessionStatus (todo/in-progress/needs-review/done/cancelled) tanimlandi
SessionMode (quick-chat/planning/tdd/debug/code-review) tanimlandi
SessionProcessingState, TokenUsage, SessionPhaseProgress, SessionLabel, SessionAgent interfaces tanimlandi
SessionFilter ve SessionSort interfaces eklendi (liste filtreleme ve siralama)
shared/src/types/message.ts olusturuldu - Message, MessageCreate, Turn, Activity interfaces
MessageRole (user/assistant/system), MessageContentType, ToolName, ToolStatus tanimlandi
ToolUseActivity, ToolResultActivity, Activity interfaces tanimlandi
TodoItem, TodoList, Plan interfaces eklendi (TodoWrite ve Plan modu destegi)
MessageChunk interface eklendi (streaming mesaj destegi)
WSMessage, WSOutputMessage, WSStatusMessage, WSErrorMessage interfaces eklendi (WebSocket tipleri)
shared/src/types/index.ts guncellendi - tum yeni tipler re-export edildi
npm run build basariyla test edildi - TypeScript derleme hatasiz tamamlandi

entries.title: Shared Types - Agent & API
changes: shared/src/types/agent.ts olusturuldu - Agent sistemi icin kapsamli type tanimlari
AgentRuntimeStatus (idle/starting/running/paused/stopping/completed/error) tanimlandi
AgentType (orchestrator/planner/architect/implementer/reviewer/tester/security/debugger) tanimlandi
AgentCapabilities interface eklendi (canSpawnAgents, canExecuteTools, canModifyFiles, vb.)
AgentConfig interface eklendi (name, description, type, tools, model, thinkingLevel, systemPrompt)
Agent interface eklendi (runtime agent instance icin tum alanlar)
AgentTokenUsage, AgentSummary interfaces eklendi
ToolCall ve ToolResult interfaces eklendi (tool cagri/sonuc yonetimi)
AgentHandoff interface eklendi (agent'lar arasi is aktarimi)
TaskPriority, TaskType, AgentTask, TaskQueue interfaces eklendi (task queue sistemi)
OrchestratorConfig ve OrchestrationState interfaces eklendi (orchestration yonetimi)
AgentEvent, AgentSpawnedEvent, AgentProgressEvent, AgentCompletedEvent, AgentErrorEvent interfaces eklendi
shared/src/types/api.ts olusturuldu - API response type tanimlari
ApiResponse<T>, ApiMeta, PaginatedResponse<T>, PaginationMeta interfaces eklendi
ApiErrorCode type eklendi (UNAUTHORIZED, NOT_FOUND, VALIDATION_ERROR, vb. 25+ hata kodu)
ApiError, FieldError, ApiErrorResponse interfaces eklendi (detayli hata yonetimi)
PaginationParams, SortParams, ListParams, DateRangeFilter interfaces eklendi
HealthCheckResponse, ServiceStatus, LoginRequest, LoginResponse, VerifyTokenResponse interfaces eklendi
BatchRequest, BatchResult, BatchDeleteRequest, BatchUpdateRequest interfaces eklendi (batch islemler)
SSEMessage, StreamStatus interfaces eklendi (server-sent events)
shared/src/types/websocket.ts olusturuldu - WebSocket event type tanimlari
ServerEventType (40+ event tipi: session, message, agent, tool, phase, context, diff, test events)
ServerMessage, ClientMessage generic interfaces eklendi
Session events: created, updated, deleted, started, paused, resumed, stopped, ended, error, refreshing, refreshed
Message events: new, chunk, complete, error (streaming destegi)
Agent events: spawned, started, progress, paused, resumed, completed, error, stopped
Tool events: called, progress, result, error
Phase events: started, progress, completed, error
Context events: warning, overflow (token yonetimi)
Diff events: update (FileChange interface ile)
Test events: started, progress, result
Client events: pong, subscribe, unsubscribe, typing, stop, pause, resume
ServerEvents, ClientEvents, WSEvents union types eklendi
Type guard fonksiyonlari eklendi: isServerEvent, isClientEvent, isSessionEvent, isAgentEvent, isToolEvent, isPhaseEvent
shared/src/types/index.ts guncellendi - tum yeni tipler export edildi (100+ type export)
TypeScript build basariyla test edildi - hata yok

entries.title: Backend Express Kurulumu
changes: backend/src/config/env.ts olusturuldu - dotenv ile environment variable yonetimi
EnvConfig interface tanimlandi (PORT, JWT_SECRET, DATA_PATH, NODE_ENV, CORS_ORIGIN, LOG_LEVEL)
getEnvString ve getEnvNumber helper fonksiyonlari eklendi (default value ve validation destegi)
validateNodeEnv ve validateLogLevel fonksiyonlari eklendi (strict type validation)
isProduction, isDevelopment, isTest helper export'lar eklendi
dotenv override: true ile mevcut env variable'larin override edilmesi saglandi
backend/.env olusturuldu - PORT=3001, JWT_SECRET, DATA_PATH, NODE_ENV, CORS_ORIGIN, LOG_LEVEL
backend/src/index.ts olusturuldu - Express server entry point
Express app CORS, JSON body parser (50mb limit), URL encoded middleware'leri eklendi
Development mode icin request logging middleware eklendi
/api/health endpoint eklendi (status, timestamp, uptime, environment, version)
/api root endpoint eklendi (API bilgi response)
404 Not Found handler eklendi
Global error handler eklendi (development mode'da stack trace gosterimi)
Server startup banner eklendi (box format, port/env/data-path/cors bilgileri)
Graceful shutdown eklendi (SIGTERM, SIGINT handling, 10s timeout)
pnpm install ile backend bagimliliklari yuklendi
npm run build basariyla test edildi
npm run dev ile server 3001 portunda basariyla calistirildi
